author: Reuters Editorial
title: Servision Says FY ‍Revenues Were Up On 2016
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Servision Plc:
* REVENUES FOR YEAR TO 31 DECEMBER 2017 WERE UP STRONGLY ON 2016, WITH COMPANY EXPERIENCING QUARTER ON QUARTER SALES GROWTH THROUGH YEAR​
* ‍TRADING IN Q4 OF 2017 SHOWED A MARKED IMPROVEMENT ON RECENT YEARS​
* ‍SALES IN SECOND HALF OF YEAR HAVE BEEN HIGHER THAN IN FIRST HALF​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
